A request to search for notes, tasks, and reminders.
The handler interface for searching for notes, tasks, and reminders.
Your app’s response to a request to search for notes, tasks, or reminders.

Initializes the intent object with the specified search parameters.
The type of items to include in your search.
Constants indicating the types of items to search.
The title text to search for in a note, task, or task list.
The text to search for in the body of a note.

The unique identifier that your app assigned to the item.

Searching for Tasks by Their Priority

inlineContent.text: object when the user asks to search for existing notes, tasks, and reminders. The intent object contains search parameters such as the type of items to return, strings to match against the title or content, the completion status of tasks, or the trigger conditions used to generate reminders.
To handle this intent, the handler object in your Intents extension must adopt the
protocol. Your handler should confirm the request and create an
lists additional attributes of this intent object.

abstract.text: Search for notebook items intent attributes

inlineContent.text: Users can ask Siri to search for notebook items in a variety of ways.
provides a few sample phrases in different languages. You can use these phrases during testing to trigger your intents. This list isn’t exhaustive and Siri may recognize many other phrases.
Show me all my notes on <appName>
Show me what I created last week on <appName>
显示我所有的便笺(在<appName> 上)
显示我上个星期所有新建立的(在 appName> 上)
顯示(<appName> 入面)所有嘅備忘錄
顯示我上星期(喺 <appName>)建立嘅項目
顯示我所有的備忘錄(在 <appName> 上)
顯示我上週在 <appName> 上建立的東西
显示(<appName> 入面)所有嘅备忘录
显示我上星期(喺 <appName>)建立嘅项目
اعرض ما تم إنشاؤه الأسبوع الماضي على  <appName>
vis mig alle mine noter i <appName>
vis mig hvad blev oprettet i <appName> sidste uge i
Zeige mir alle meine Notizen auf <appName>
Zeig mir die Notizen die ich letzte Woche in <appName> erstellt habe
Muéstrame lo que creé en <appName> la semana pasada
Näytä viime viikolla apissa <appName> luomani muistutukset
Montre-moi ce que j'ai créé la semaine dernière sur <appName>
תראי לי את כל הפתקים ב<appName>
תראי מה יצרתי שבוע שעבר ב<appName>
Mostrami tutte le mie note su <appName>
Mostrami cosa ho creato la scorsa settimana su <appName>
<appName>  で先週作ったメモを全部見せて
<appName>  에서 지난 주에 만든 것 보여줘
Tunjukkan item yang diciptakan minggu lepas pada <appName>
Vis det jeg laget i forrige uke på <appName>
Toon wat ik vorige week aangemaakt heb op <appName>
Mostrar todas as minhas notas no <appName>
Mostre o que eu criei na semana passada no <appName>
Покажи мне что я создал на прошлой неделе в <appName>
Visa mig alla mina anteckningar i <appName>
Visa mig vad jag skapade förra veckan i <appName>
แสดงโน้ตทั้งหมดบนแอพ <appName>
แสดงสิ่งที่ฉันสร้างอาทิตย์ที่แล้วในแอพ <appName>

abstract.text: Siri phrases that trigger a search for notes, tasks, task lists, or reminders

inlineContent.text: , <appName> represents the name of the app whose Intents extension handles the request.
